reviews.review: Nur geistig Behinderte k√∂nnen dieses Spiel spielen

This is one of those games that has always had a bit of a hacking problem, but since it went F2P that has absolutely EXPLODED.
If you want to play this game, get used to level1 steam accounts full of hacks aimbotting you through walls in the most unashamedly obvious ways; they don't even try to hide it, it's more like trolling and griefing on their free accounts with their free game, and it's all just for laughs for them.
I've played a TONNE of this game before it went F2P (since right back in 1.6) and it has never felt like such a cesspool as it does now.
High skill aiming game which requires youre time and effort to get better at.
